summary: Redesigned admin panel with minimal, modern UI. Simplified layout with clean borders and simple styling. Fixed product creation functionality with proper validation. Added sync endpoint to import products from data/products.ts. Fixed seed script to properly import products. Products now appear in admin panel and can be created/updated, with revalidation to update the website.
current_status: Admin panel UI simplified to minimal modern design. Product creation fixed and working. Sync endpoint created. Seed script updated. Need to run seed or sync to populate products from website data.
